ground_truths: RMS values consistently above the baseline

questions.question: What visual evidence defined the moderate wear stage?
ground_truths: Enlarging contact scars, measurable loss of flank curvature

questions.question: What vibration evidence defined the moderate wear stage?
ground_truths: RMS increased by 10–20% and organized sidebands

questions.question: What visual evidence defined the severe wear stage?
ground_truths: Sharp-edged scars, scuffing, tearing, deep scarring, pitting

questions.question: What vibration evidence defined the severe wear stage?
ground_truths: RMS 25–40% above baseline, dense sidebands, impulsive transients

questions.question: What visual evidence confirmed failure on June 15?
ground_truths: Deep gouges, fragmented edges, spalling, fractured surfaces

questions.question: What vibration evidence confirmed failure on June 15?
ground_truths: Unstable RMS and reduced spectral energy

questions.question: What physical meaning is associated with failure?
ground_truths: Gear pair can no longer transfer energy; failed state

questions.question: What was the purpose of photographic inspections?
ground_truths: To detect earliest wear onset and corroborate wear evolution

questions.question: What was recommended regarding RMS monitoring thresholds?
ground_truths: Update thresholds with lower alarm levels

questions.question: What diagnostic markers in the frequency domain were emphasized?
ground_truths: Sidebands around the gear meshing frequency

questions.question: What predictive maintenance approach was recommended?
ground_truths: Link image-based wear depth to vibration features to estimate RUL

questions.question: What intervention threshold was suggested for mild wear?
What intervention threshold was suggested for moderate wear?
What intervention threshold was suggested for severe wear?
ground_truths: Immediate intervention required to prevent failure

questions.question: What tool was recommended to improve analysis of image data?
ground_truths: AI-driven feature extraction (crack detection, pitting quantification)

questions.question: What was the overall recommendation of the report?
ground_truths: Adopt dual-path monitoring: visual inspection + vibration analysis
